mapper.select: select * FROM customer WHERE cust_id = #{cust_id} AND cust_password = #{cust_password}
mapper.insert: insert into customer(custid, name, address, phone) values(customer_seq.nextval,#{name},#{address},#{phone})
mapper.update: update customer set name=#{name}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone} where custid = #{custid}
